errors.error_description: Used deprecated setup.py install command with --force flag instead of modern pip installation
correction_candidates: Use `pip install django-mysql` for standard PyPI installation
Use `pip install .` for local development installation
Install with `python -m pip install django-mysql` for better compatibility
Use `pip install -e .` for editable development installation
errors.golden_answer: Use `pip install django-mysql` for standard PyPI installation
